Pusher (https://pusher.com) | Software Engineering Manager | London | Full time

Our pub-sub API is used by tens of thousands of developers across the world to add realtime features to their web and mobile applications. We send over 300 billion messages a month with category-leading reliability.

We want to double down on this success, so we're building a whole new team around this product. You'll manage this team, taking care of the inevitable team scaling challenges and making sure that we continue to innovate.

Reporting to the VP of Engineering as part of our engineering leadership team, we want you to build a team of engineers who will work on our pub-sub API.

Find out more and apply here https://pusher.workable.com/jobs/695397
